attributes.action: Disband all UK Government because they are no longer needed....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because we have signed up to the EU and are now effectively governed by them, we no longer need our National (now 'local') Government.  All we need is a handful of liaison officers that will pass the various diktats through to the relevant civil servants.  So, we can finally see our MPs queuing up for a job like rest of us.  Seems fair to me, you want the EU, we no longer need UK Government.  All praise the EU!
